            order: 11,
            label: i18n.global.t('SpuView.createTime'),
            status: true,
        },
        {
            order: 12,
            label: i18n.global.t('SpuView.enable'),
            status: true,
        },
        {
            order: 13,
            label: i18n.global.t('common.table.operation'),
            status: true,
        },
    ]
}

2.æ§åˆ¶ç»„ä»¶

<template>
  <div class="moduleBoxView">
    <div class="moduleFrom">
      <el-form :inline="true" :model="fromData" class="demo-form-inline" :label-width="100" label-position="right">
          
        <div v-show="viewSty.showForm">
          
        </div>

        <div style="margin-bottom: 15px">
        

          <el-radio-group style="float: right"  v-if="homeSty.viewSty.viewButton">
            <el-dropdown>
              <el-radio-button :label="$t('system.train')" value="New York" />
              <template #dropdown>
                <div class="train-sty">
                  <el-checkbox
                      v-for="item in viewSty.showTable"
                      v-model="item.status"
                      :label="item.label"
                      @change="setViewSty()"
                      size="large"
                  />
                </div>
              </template>
            </el-dropdown>
            <el-radio-button :label="$t('system.frame')" @click="setFormSty()" />
          </el-radio-group>
        </div>

      </el-form>
    </div>

    <div class="moduletTable" ref="tableDiv">
      <el-table :data="tableData" :height="tabHeight" stripe border fit highlight-current-row :empty-text="$t('common.table.noData')" style="width: 100%; margin-bottom: 5px;" >
        <el-table-column v-if="viewSty.showTable[0].status" fixed type="index" :label="$t('common.table.number')" width="90"/>
        <el-table-column v-if="viewSty.showTable[1].status" prop="barCode" :label="$t('SeriesView.barCode')" width="250" show-overflow-tooltip></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column v-if="viewSty.showTable[2].status" prop="name" :label="$t('SeriesView.name')" show-overflow-tooltip></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column v-if="viewSty.showTable[3].status" prop="nameEn" :label="$t('SeriesView.nameEn')" show-overflow-tooltip></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column v-if="viewSty.showTable[4].status" fixed="right" :label="$t('common.table.operation')" width="300">
          <template #default="scope">
            <el-button type="primary" size="small" @click="goOperate(scope.$index, scope.row, 'detail')"> {{ $t('common.button.detail') }} </el-button>
            <el-button type="warning" size="small" @click="goOperate(scope.$index, scope.row, 'edit')" v-show="isButton('series.update')"> {{ $t('common.button.edit') }} </el-button>
            <el-button type="danger" size="small" @click="deleteRow(scope.$index, scope.row)" v-show="isButton('series.delete')">  {{ $t('common.button.delete') }}  </el-button>
          </template>
        </el-table-column>
      </el-table>
    </div>

</template>

<script>

export default {
  name: "styleVeiw",
  // data: å¯¹è±¡å°±æ˜¯è¦æ¸²æŸ“åˆ°é¡µé¢ä¸Šçš„æ•°æ®
  data: function () {
    return {
      // å…¨å±€çš„æ ·å¼è®¾ç½®
      homeSty: window.localStorage.getItem("homeSty") ? JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem("homeSty")) : defaultTheme,
      // åœ¨æœªè¯»å–åˆ°æœ¬åœ°çš„è®¾ç½®æ•°æ®åˆ™è·å–è®¾ç½®å¸¸é‡æ•°æ®
      viewSty: JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(seriesView)),
    }
  },

  // moubted: é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæ¯•åæ‰§è¡Œ
  mounted() {
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–è·å–ç»„ä»¶ åˆ—è®¾ç½®å’ŒæŸ¥è¯¢è¡¨å•è®¾ç½® çš„è®¾ç½®æ•°æ®
    this.getViewSty();
  },

  // methods: å¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­è°ƒç”¨
  methods: {
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–è·å–ç»„ä»¶ åˆ—è®¾ç½®å’ŒæŸ¥è¯¢è¡¨å•è®¾ç½® çš„è®¾ç½®æ•°æ®
    getViewSty() {
      let winSty = window.localStorage.getItem("moduleViewSty");
      if (winSty) {
        let data = JSON.parse(winSty);
        if (data.seriesSty) this.viewSty = data.seriesSty;
      }
    },
    // æŸ¥è¯¢è¡¨å•è®¾ç½®æ‰§è¡Œ
    setFormSty() {
      this.viewSty.showForm = !this.viewSty.showForm;
      this.setViewSty();
    },
    // åˆ—è®¾ç½®çš„è®¾ç½®æ‰§è¡Œ
    setViewSty() {
      let data = {};
      let winSty = window.localStorage.getItem("moduleViewSty");
      if (winSty) {
        data = JSON.parse(winSty);
        data.seriesSty = this.viewSty;
      } else {
        data.seriesSty = this.viewSty;
      }
      window.localStorage.setItem('moduleViewSty', JSON.stringify(data));
    },
}
</script>
    
/*åˆ—è®¾ç½®çš„æ ·å¼*/
.train-sty {
  width: 110px;
  max-height: 300px;
  overflow: auto;
  padding: 15px
}

# Table è¡¨æ ¼çš„å°è£…

  1. TableView.vue / Table è¡¨æ ¼å…¬å…±ç±»
<template>
  <div id="TableView" style="height: 100%">
    <el-table :data="tableData" stripe border fit highlight-current-row :empty-text="$t('common.table.noData')" style="width: 100%; margin-bottom: 5px;">
      <!-- åºå·åˆ— -->
      <el-table-column
          :fixed="tableIndexColumn.fixed"
          :type="tableIndexColumn.prop"
          :label="tableIndexColumn.label"
          :width="tableIndexColumn.width"
      />
      <!-- è¡¨å¤´åˆ— -->
      <el-table-column
          :index="index" v-for="(column, key, index) in tableColumn" :key="key"
          :prop="column.prop"
          :label="column.label"
          :width="column.width"
          :show-overflow-tooltip="column.showOverflowTooltip"
      />
      <!-- æŒ‰é’®åˆ— -->
      <el-table-column fixed="right" :label="$t('common.table.operation')" width="300">
        <template #default="scope">
          <el-button
              :index="index" v-for="(button, key, index) in buttonList" :key="key"
              :type="button.type"
              :size="button.size"
              @click="buttonClick(scope.$index, scope.row, button.click)"
              v-show="button.show"
          >
            {{ button.label }}
          </el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>

    </el-table>
  </div>
</template>

<script>

export default {
  name: 'TableView',
  props: {
    // åºåˆ—
    tableIndexColumn: {
      type: Object,
      required: true // å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ç¡®ä¿è¯¥å±æ€§å¿…é¡»ä¼ é€’ï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸ºtrue
    },
    // è¡¨å¤´
    tableColumn: {
      type: Array,
      required: true // å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ç¡®ä¿è¯¥å±æ€§å¿…é¡»ä¼ é€’ï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸ºtrue
    },
    // è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®
    tableData: {
      type: Array,
      required: true
    },
    // æŒ‰é’®åˆ—è¡¨
    buttonList: {
      type: Array,
      required: true
    },
  },
  data: function () {
    return {

    };
  },

  // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œå›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®èµ‹å€¼åˆå§‹åŒ–æ˜¾ç¤º
  mounted() {
    // åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥è®¿é—®this.tableDataå’Œthis.tabHeightï¼Œå®ƒä»¬åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ä»çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ä¼ é€’è¿‡æ¥çš„å±æ€§å€¼
    // console.log('tableData:', this.tableData);
    // console.log('tabHeight:', this.tabHeight);
  },

  methods: {
    // æ“ä½œæŒ‰é’® (index: å½“å‰è¡Œç´¢å¼•, row: å½“å‰è¡Œæ•°æ®, type: æ“ä½œç±»å‹) type: detail, edit, delete
    // é€šè¿‡$emitå°†æ•°æ®ä¼ é€’ç»™çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶
    buttonClick(index, row, type) {
      let rowData = {
        index: index,
        row: row,
        type: type
      };
      this.$emit('childClick', rowData);
    },
  },
}
</script>

<!-- ç»„ä»¶æ ·å¼ -->
<style scoped>
/*å›¾è¡¨çš„æ ·å¼*/
#chartDiv {
  width: 100%;
  height: 300px;
}
</style>
  1. function.js é…ç½®æ•°æ®
import {i18n} from '@/main.js';
import {resourceIsUser} from "@/util/resource";

// è¡¨æ ¼åˆ—é…ç½®
export function getFunctionTable() {
    return {
        // è¡¨æ ¼åºå·åˆ—
        columnIndex: {prop: 'index', label: i18n.global.t('common.table.number'), width: 90, fixed: true},
        // è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®åˆ—
        columnList: [
            {prop: 'barCode', label: i18n.global.t('FunctionView.barCode'), width: 250, showOverflowTooltip: true},
            {prop: 'name', label: i18n.global.t('FunctionView.name'), showOverflowTooltip: true},
            {prop: 'nameEn', label: i18n.global.t('FunctionView.nameEn'), showOverflowTooltip: true},
        ],
        // è¡¨æ ¼æ“ä½œåˆ—
        buttonList: [
            {label: i18n.global.t('common.button.detail'), type: 'primary', size: 'small', show: true, click: 'detail'},
            {label: i18n.global.t('common.button.edit'), type: 'warning', size: 'small', show: resourceIsUser('function.update'), click: 'edit'},
            {label: i18n.global.t('common.button.delete'), type: 'danger', size: 'small', show: resourceIsUser('function.delete'), click: 'delete'},
        ],
    }
}
  1. å°è£…ä½¿ç”¨
<template>
  <div class="moduleBoxView">
    <!-- æŸ¥è¯¢è¡¨å• -->
    <div class="moduleFrom">
      <el-form :inline="true" :model="fromData" class="demo-form-inline" :label-width="100" label-position="right">
        <el-form-item :label="$t('FunctionView.nameQuery')">
          <el-input v-model="fromData.name" :placeholder="$t('FunctionView.nameQueryPlaceholder')" clearable></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item>
          <el-button type="primary" @click="listData()" icon="Search"> {{ $t('common.button.search') }} </el-button>
          <el-button type="info" @click="reset()" icon="Loading">  {{ $t('common.button.reset') }} </el-button>
          <el-button type="success" v-show="isButton('function.add')" @click="add()"> {{ $t('common.button.add') }} </el-button>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-form>
    </div>
	<!-- è¡¨æ ¼ -->
    <div class="moduletTable" ref="tableDiv">
      <TableView
          :tableData="tableData"
          :tableColumn="tableColumn.columnList"
          :tableIndexColumn="tableColumn.columnIndex"
          :buttonList="tableColumn.buttonList"
          @childClick="tabButtonClick"
      />
    </div>
	<!-- åˆ†é¡µ -->
    <div class="modulePagination">
      <el-pagination
          background
          v-model:current-page="pageNum"
          v-model:page-size="pageSize"
          :page-sizes="[10, 30, 50, 75, 100]"
          :small="false"
          layout="prev, pager, next, sizes, jumper, total"
          :total="total"
          @size-change="handleSizeChange"
          @current-change="handleCurrentChange"
      />
    </div>
    <function-operate ref="operate" @operateClick="listData"/>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import {resourceIsUser} from "@/util/resource";
import {getRolePullDown} from "@/http/PullDownApi";
import {ElLoading, ElNotification} from "element-plus";
import {deleteFunctionById, listFunction} from "@/http/spuData/functionApi";
import functionOperate from "@/views/spuData/function/function-operate";
import TableView from "@/views/common/TableView";
import {getFunctionTable} from "@/views/spuData/function/function";

export default {
  name: "styleVeiw",
  components: {functionOperate, TableView},
  // data: å¯¹è±¡å°±æ˜¯è¦æ¸²æŸ“åˆ°é¡µé¢ä¸Šçš„æ•°æ®
  data: function () {
    return {
      tabHeight: 0, // è¡¨æ ¼é«˜åº¦

      selectData: {}, // æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡†æ•°æ®é›†åˆå¯¹è±¡
      fromData: {}, // æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶

      tableData: [], // è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®
      tableColumn: getFunctionTable(), // è·å–è¡¨æ ¼é…ç½®æ•°æ®
      total: 0,           // æ€»æ¡æ•°
      pages: 0,           // æ€»é¡µæ•°
      pageNum: 1,         //å½“å‰é¡µç 
      pageSize: 30,        // æ¯é¡µæ¡æ•°
    }
  },

  // moubted: é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæ¯•åæ‰§è¡Œ
  mounted() {
    this.getSelectData();
    this.listData();
    this.refreshTableHeight();
  },

  // methods: å¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­è°ƒç”¨
  methods: {
    // åˆ·æ–°è¡¨æ ¼é«˜åº¦
    refreshTableHeight() {
      // åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª ResizeObserver å®ä¾‹
      const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver(entries => {
        // entries æ˜¯ ResizeObserverEntry å¯¹è±¡çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼ŒåŒ…å«è§‚å¯Ÿåˆ°çš„å…ƒç´ ä¿¡æ¯
        for (const entry of entries) {
          if (entry.target === this.$refs.tableDiv) {
            // å¦‚æœè§‚å¯Ÿåˆ°çš„å…ƒç´ æ˜¯ä½ è¦ç›‘å¬çš„å…ƒç´ 
            // console.log('çª—å£å¤§å°æ”¹å˜ï¼Œæ–°çš„è¡¨æ ¼é«˜åº¦ï¼š', entry.contentRect.height);
            this.tabHeight = this.$refs.tableDiv.offsetHeight - 20;
          }
        }
      });
      // å°† ResizeObserver æ³¨å†Œåˆ°è¦è§‚å¯Ÿçš„å…ƒç´ 
      resizeObserver.observe(this.$refs.tableDiv);
    },

    // è·å–æŒ‰é’®æƒé™
    isButton(symbolStr) {
      return resourceIsUser(symbolStr);
    },

    // è·å–æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶æ•°æ®
    getSelectData() {
      // è·å–è§’è‰²çš„æ•°æ®
      getRolePullDown().then(res => {
        if (res.data.status == 200) this.selectData.roleList = res.data.data;
      }).catch((erro) => {
      });
    },
    // åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®è¯·æ±‚
    listData() {
      const loading = ElLoading.service({
        lock: true, text: this.$t('common.loadingText'), background: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)',}
      );
      this.fromData.pageSize = this.pageSize;
      this.fromData.pageNum = this.pageNum;
      listFunction(this.fromData).then(res => {
        this.tableData = res.data.data.list;
        // ç»™åˆ†é¡µç»„ä»¶çš„æ•°æ®èµ‹å€¼
        this.total = res.data.data.total;
        this.pages = res.data.data.pages;
        this.pageNum = res.data.data.pageNum;
        this.pageSize = res.data.data.pageSize;
      }).catch((erro) => {
        console.log(erro, 'erro')
      }).finally(() => {
        // è¯·æ±‚æ— è®ºæˆåŠŸ/å¤±è´¥ éƒ½æ‰§è¡Œå…³é—­loading
        loading.close();
      });
    },
    // è®¾ç½®æ¯é¡µæ¡æ•°æ–¹æ³• val=æ¡æ•°
    handleSizeChange(val) {
      console.log(`æ¯é¡µ ${val} æ¡`);
      this.pageNum = 1;                       // ä¿®æ”¹å½“å‰é¡µä¸ºç¬¬1é¡µ
      this.pageSize = val;               // ä¿®æ”¹æ¯é¡µæ¡æ•°
      this.listData();
    },
    // ç‚¹å‡» å‰ä¸€é¡µã€åä¸€é¡µã€é¡µç  äº‹ä»¶
    handleCurrentChange(val) {
      console.log(`å½“å‰é¡µ: ${val}`);
      this.pageNum = val;                 // ä¿®æ”¹å½“å‰é¡µç 
      this.listData();
    },
    // é‡ç½®æŒ‰é’®
    reset() {
      this.fromData = {};
      this.listData();
    },

    // æ–°å¢
    add() {
      this.$refs.operate.dialogFormVisible = true;
      this.$refs.operate.type = "add";
    },
    tabButtonClick(rowData) {
      if (rowData.type == "delete") {
        this.deleteRow(rowData.index, rowData.row);
      } else {
        this.goOperate(rowData.index, rowData.row, rowData.type);
      }

    },
    // è¯¦æƒ… / ç¼–è¾‘ æ‰§è¡Œæ–¹æ³•
    goOperate(index, row, type) {
      this.$refs.operate.dialogFormVisible = true;
      this.$refs.operate.type = type;
      if (type == "detail") {
        // å¼€å¯åªè¯» | æ·±æ‹·è´åˆ›å»ºäº†ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´å‰¯æœ¬
        this.$refs.operate.isReadonly = true;
        this.$refs.operate.form = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(row));
      } else if (type == "edit") {
        this.$refs.operate.rowData = row;
        this.$refs.operate.form = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(row));
      }
    },
    // åˆ é™¤
    deleteRow(index, row) {
      this.$confirm(this.$t('common.dialog.deleteTips') , this.$t('common.dialog.deleteTitle'), {
        confirmButtonText: this.$t('common.button.confirm'), cancelButtonText: this.$t('common.button.cancel'), type: 'warning'
      }).then(() => {
        // åå°è¯·æ±‚åˆ é™¤æ•°æ®åº“æ•°æ®
        deleteFunctionById({id: row.id}).then(res => {
          if (res.data.status == 200) {
            // åˆ é™¤å‰ç«¯æ¸²æŸ“æ•°ç»„çš„æ•°æ®
            this.tableData.splice(index, 1);
            ElNotification({title: this.$t('common.message.successTitle'), message: res.data.msg, type: 'success',})
          }
        }).catch(error => {
        });
      })
    },
  },
}
</script>

<!--ç»„ä»¶cssæ ·å¼ scoped:è¡¨ç¤ºè¯¥æ ·å¼åªåœ¨æ­¤ç»„ä»¶ç”Ÿæ•ˆ-->
<style scoped>
/*å¯¼èˆªå°æ ‡é¢˜*/
.el-breadcrumb {
  padding: 0px 0px 20px 0px;
}
</style>

# Axios ä½¿ç”¨

# å®‰è£… Axios

å‚è€ƒåœ°å€: csdn æ–‡ç« 

1.å®‰è£… Axios: ä½¿ç”¨npm æˆ– yarn å®‰è£…axiosåˆ°é¡¹ç›®ä¸­

// ä½¿ç”¨npm å®‰è£…
npm install axios
//æˆ–è€… ä½¿ç”¨yarn å®‰è£…
yarn add axios

2.å¼•å…¥ Axios

å±€éƒ¨å¼•å…¥ Axios : çš„ä½¿ç”¨éå¸¸ç®€å•ï¼Œå¦‚æœåªæƒ³åœ¨å•ä¸ªç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨axiosï¼Œåªéœ€è¦åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å¼•å…¥axiosï¼Œç„¶åå°±å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨äº†

import axios from 'axios'
onMounted(() => {
    getData()
})
const getData = async ()=>{
  const response = await axios.get('/hangzhou.json')
  console.log(response.data.features);  
}

**å…¨å±€å¼•å…¥ Axios **: å¦‚æœæƒ³è¦å…¨å±€å¼•å…¥axiosï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å€ŸåŠ© vue æä¾›çš„ provide å’Œ inject æ–¹æ³•æ¥å®ç°

åœ¨main.jsä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ provide æ–¹æ³• æ³¨å…¥axiosï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹

import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'
import ElementPlus from 'element-plus';
// å¼•å…¥ axios
import axios from 'axios';

const app = createApp(App);
app.use(router);
app.provide('$axios',axios);
app.mount("#app");

# Axios åŸºç¡€ä½¿ç”¨

getçš„è°ƒç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹

// ç®€å•è°ƒç”¨
axios.get('/api/data').then(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
}).catch(function (error) {
  console.log(error);
});

// å®Œæ•´è°ƒç”¨
axios({
  method: 'get',
  url: '/api/data',
  params: {
    id: 123
  }
}).then(function (response) {
   console.log(response);
}).catch(function (error) {
   console.log(error);
});

postçš„è°ƒç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹

// ç®€å•è°ƒç”¨
axios.post('/api/data', { name: 'John', age: 30 }).then(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
}).catch(function (error) {
  console.log(error);
});

// å®Œæ•´è°ƒç”¨
axios({
  method: 'post',
  url: '/api/data',
  data: {
    name: 'John',
    age: 30
  }
}).then(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
}).catch(function (error) {
  console.log(error);
});

# Axios å°è£…

åœ¨å®é™…çš„å¼€å‘ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éƒ½ä¼šå°†axiosè¿›è¡Œå°è£…ï¼›æˆ‘åœ¨å®é™…çš„å¼€å‘ä¸­ä¼šå°†ç½‘ç»œç›¸å…³çš„ä¸šåŠ¡ç‹¬ç«‹æ”¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä¸¤ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯request.jsæ–‡ä»¶ç”¨äºå°è£… axios è¯·æ±‚ï¼›ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯api.jsæ–‡ä»¶ç”¨äºå°è£…æ‰€æœ‰çš„ API è¯·æ±‚ã€‚

åœ¨srcæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸‹æ–°å»ºhttpæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œåœ¨httpæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹æ–°å»ºrequest.jsæ–‡ä»¶å’Œapi.jsæ–‡ä»¶

æ–‡ä»¶ä¸€: åœ¨request.jsä¸­å¼•å…¥axiosï¼Œå¹¶å°è£… axios è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

  • åœ¨è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ä¸­æ·»åŠ å‰ç½®å¤„ç†ï¼Œå°†è¯·æ±‚å¤´ä¸­æ·»åŠ äº†ä¸€ä¸ª Authorization å‚æ•°ï¼Œç”¨äºåç«¯ token æƒé™æ§åˆ¶ã€‚
  • åœ¨å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ä¸­æ·»åŠ äº†åç½®å¤„ç†ï¼Œå¯¹è¿”å›ç»“æœè¿›è¡Œè§£æå’Œå¤„ç†ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¿”å›ç»“æœæˆåŠŸï¼ˆcode ä¸º 200ï¼‰åˆ™è¿”å›å¤„ç†åçš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›å¤„ç†åçš„é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯

# è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ åŸºç¡€ç‰ˆ

import axios from 'axios'

const service = axios.create({
    baseURL: process.env.VUE_APP_BASE_API,
    timeout: 5000
})

// è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨: å¸Œæœ›axiosæ¯æ¬¡å‘é€åå°è¯·æ±‚éƒ½å¸¦ä¸Štoken
service.interceptors.request.use(
    config => {
        // æ·»åŠ è¯·æ±‚å¤´ç­‰å‰ç½®å¤„ç†
        config.headers.token = window.localStorage.getItem('token');
        return config
    },
    error => {
        // è¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†
        console.log('Request Error:', error)
        return Promise.reject(error)
    }
)

// è¯·æ±‚å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
service.interceptors.response.use(
    response => {
        // å“åº”åå¤„ç†
        if (response.status === 200 && response.data.status === 200) {
            return response;
        } else if(response.data.status === 2002 || response.data.status === 502) {
            console.log(response, 'sadad');
            // æ˜¾ç¤ºæç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯
            ElMessage({
                message: 'ç™»å½•å·²è¿‡æœŸï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°ç™»å½•',
                type: 'warning',
            });
            // è·³è½¬åˆ°ç™»å½•é¡µé¢
            router.push('/login');
            // è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå¸¦æœ‰é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯çš„Promiseï¼Œä»¥é˜»æ­¢è¿›ä¸€æ­¥çš„é“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨
            return Promise.reject(new Error('ç™»å½•å·²è¿‡æœŸï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°ç™»å½•...'));
            // æ”¾è¡Œï¼ˆä¸åšä»»ä½•å¤„ç†ï¼‰
            return response;
        } else {
            ElNotification({title: 'é”™è¯¯', message: response.data.msg, type: 'error',})
        }
    },
    error => {
        let err = error.response.data;
        let mgs = err.path + '(' + err.status + '): ' + err.message;
        ElNotification({title: 'å¼‚å¸¸', message: mgs, type: 'info',})
        return Promise.reject(error);
    }
);

// // å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
// service.interceptors.response.use(
//     response => {
//         // å“åº”åå¤„ç†
//         if (response.status === 200 && response.data.code === 200) {
//             return Promise.resolve(response.data.data)
//         } else {
//             return Promise.reject(response.data)
//         }
//     },
//     error => {
//         console.log('Response Error:', error)
//         return Promise.reject(error)
//     }
// )

export default service

# è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ æ–°ç‰ˆ

import axios from 'axios'
import {ElNotification} from "element-plus";
import router from '@/router';
import {getSysLanguage} from "@/util/system";
import {i18n} from '@/main.js';


const service = axios.create({
    baseURL: process.env.VUE_APP_BASE_API,
    timeout: 10000 // è¯·æ±‚çš„è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´
})

// è·å–ç³»ç»Ÿè¯­è¨€ - è¯­è¨€åˆ‡æ¢ zh-CN_ä¸­æ–‡ en-US_è‹±æ–‡ é»˜è®¤è‹±æ–‡
const language = getSysLanguage();
// const titleStr = language === 'zh-CN' ? 'æç¤º' : 'Prompt';

// è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨: å¸Œæœ›axiosæ¯æ¬¡å‘é€åå°è¯·æ±‚éƒ½å¸¦ä¸Štoken
service.interceptors.request.use(
    config => {
        // æ·»åŠ è¯·æ±‚å¤´ç­‰å‰ç½®å¤„ç†
        const url = config.url.toLowerCase();
        // å¦‚æœè¯·æ±‚çš„ URL åŒ…å« "Clientele"ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸æºå¸¦ token
        if (!url.includes('clientele')) {
            config.headers.token = window.localStorage.getItem('token');
        }
        // æ·»åŠ è¯­è¨€è¯·æ±‚å¤´ - è¯­è¨€åˆ‡æ¢ - zh-CN_ä¸­æ–‡ en-US_è‹±æ–‡ é»˜è®¤è‹±æ–‡
        config.headers.language = language;
        return config;
    },
    error => {
        // è¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†
        console.log('Request Error:', error)
        return Promise.reject(error)
    }
)

// è¯·æ±‚å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
service.interceptors.response.use(
    response => {
        console.log('response:', response)
        // å“åº”ä¸º ä¸‹è½½è¡¨æ ¼ / ä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶ - ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        if (response.headers['content-type'] == 'application/vnd.ms-excel;charset=utf-8'
            || response.headers['content-type'] == 'application/octet-stream'
        ) {
            return response;
        }
        // å“åº”åå¤„ç†
        if (response.status === 200 && response.data.status === 200) {
            return response;
        } else if(response.data.status === 2002 || response.data.status === 502 || response.data.status === 2011) {
            // æ˜¾ç¤ºæç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯
            // ElMessage({message: response.data.msg, type: 'warning',});
            ElNotification({title: i18n.global.t('common.dialog.title'), message: response.data.msg, type: 'warning',})
            // æ¸…é™¤ token
            window.localStorage.removeItem('token');
            // è·³è½¬åˆ°ç™»å½•é¡µé¢
            router.push('/login');
            // è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå¸¦æœ‰é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯çš„Promiseï¼Œä»¥é˜»æ­¢è¿›ä¸€æ­¥çš„é“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨
            return Promise.reject(new Error(response.data.msg));
            // æ”¾è¡Œï¼ˆä¸åšä»»ä½•å¤„ç†ï¼‰
            return response;
        } else {
            ElNotification({title: i18n.global.t('common.dialog.title'), message: response.data.msg, type: 'error',})
        }
    },
    error => {
        let err = error.response.data;
        let mgs = err.path + '(' + err.status + '): ' + err.message;
        ElNotification({title: i18n.global.t('common.dialog.title'), message: err.message, type: 'info',})
        return Promise.reject(error);
    }
);

export default service

æ–‡ä»¶äºŒ: åœ¨api.jsä¸­å¼•å…¥ä¸Šé¢å°è£…å¥½çš„request.jsæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¹¶å°è£…æ‰€æœ‰çš„ API è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

import request from './request'

// æµ‹è¯•
export function testapi() {
    return request({
        url: '/api/china/test',
        method: 'get'
    })
}

// ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•
export function login(data) {
    return request({
        url: '/login',
        method: 'post',
        data
    })
}

# Axios å°è£…ç»„ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨

<script>
import axios from "axios";
// å¼•å…¥APIè¯·æ±‚åœ°å€    
import { testapi } from '../http/api.js'

export default {
    name: 'LoginView',
    data: function() {
        
    },
    created() {
        
    },
    methods: {
        test() {
          // è°ƒç”¨API then_æ­£å¸¸æ‰§è¡Œ / catch_æ‰§è¡Œå¼‚å¸¸
          testapi().then(res => {
            console.log(res.data);
            this.userForm.username = res.data
          }).catch((erro) => {
            console.log(erro, 'erro')
          });
        },
}
</script>

# Get è¯·æ±‚ç¤ºä¾‹

        url: '/api/resourceInfo/getMenu',
        method: 'get'
    })
}
getMenuList().then((res) => {
  if (res.status == 200) {
    
  }
}).catch((erro) => {

});

// get è¯·æ±‚ æ‹¼æ¥å‚æ•°
export function listResourceInfoOrRole(roleId) {
    return request({
        url: '/api/resourceInfo/listResourceInfoOrRole?roleId=' + roleId,
        method: 'get'
    })
}
listResourceInfoOrRole(row.id).then(res => {
  if (res.data.status == 200) {
    
  }
}).catch((erro) => { });

// get è¯·æ±‚ params å¤šå‚æ•°
export function listResourceInfoOrRole(params) {
    return request({
        url: '/api/resourceInfo/listResourceInfoOrRole',
        method: 'get',
        params: params
    });
}
listResourceInfoOrRole({ roleId: 123, otherParam: 'someValue' }) .then(res => {
    // å¤„ç†å“åº”
}) .catch(error => {
  	// å¤„ç†é”™è¯¯
});

// Post è¯·æ±‚ å¯¹è±¡å‚æ•°

    return request({
        url: '/api/resourceInfo/listResourceInfo',
        method: 'post',
        data
    })
}
listResourceInfo(this.fromData).then(res => {
  
}).catch((erro) => {
  console.log(erro, 'erro')
});

# ä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶ç±»è¯·æ±‚

  • ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤çš„ Ajax è¯·æ±‚å»ä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯æ— æ³•è®©æµè§ˆå™¨è‡ªåŠ¨ä¸‹è½½çš„
  • å¿…é¡»è·å–åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶æµä¹‹å åšæˆaé“¾æ¥è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½
  • å¿…é¡»æ³¨æ„ è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ è®°å¾—å“åº”æ”¾è¡Œ / ä¸‹è½½è¯·æ±‚å“åº”çš„æ˜¯æµå¹¶éçŠ¶æ€ç ä¼šè¢«æ‹¦æˆª

# Post è¯·æ±‚ + jsonå¯¹è±¡

// å¯¼å‡ºè¡¨æ ¼ data:æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶å¯¹è±¡
export function exportExcel(data) {
    return request({
        url: '/api/spuInfo/exportExcel',
        method: 'post',
        data: JSON.stringify(data), // å°†æ•°æ®è½¬æ¢ä¸º JSON å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
        headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json' // æŒ‡å®šå†…å®¹ç±»å‹ä¸º JSON
        },
        responseType: 'blob'
    }).then(res => {
        // æ–‡ä»¶åå‰ç¼€ + æ—¶é—´æˆ³ + æ–‡ä»¶åç¼€
        let fileName = 'äº§å“è¡¨-' + new Date().getTime() + '.xlsx'
        let blob = new Blob([res.data], {type: "application/vnd.ms-excel;charset=UTF-8"});
        if (window.navigator && window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob) { // IE
            window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob(blob, fileName)
        } else {
            let objectUrl = (window.URL || window.webkitURL).createObjectURL(blob)
            let downFile = document.createElement('a')
            downFile.style.display = 'none'
            downFile.href = objectUrl
            downFile.download = fileName // ä¸‹è½½åæ–‡ä»¶å
            document.body.appendChild(downFile)
            downFile.click()
            document.body.removeChild(downFile) // ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆç§»é™¤å…ƒç´ 
            window.URL.revokeObjectURL(objectUrl)   // åªè¦æ˜ å°„å­˜åœ¨ï¼ŒBlobå°±ä¸èƒ½è¿›è¡Œåƒåœ¾å›æ”¶ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸€æ—¦ä¸å†éœ€è¦å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œå°±å¿…é¡»å°å¿ƒæ’¤é”€URLï¼Œé‡Šæ”¾æ‰blobå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
        }
    }).catch(err=>{
        console.log(err)
    })
}

# Post è¯·æ±‚ + é”®å€¼å¯¹

// ä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶ - é€šè¿‡æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ / filePath: "/tmp/spuImg/2024-02-27/f97a82749b924bb49136a8f94dd10957.jpeg"
export function downloadFileByFilePath(filePath) {
    return request({
        url: '/api/uploadFile/downloadFileByFilePath',
        method: 'post',
        params: {
            filePath: filePath
        },
        responseType: 'blob'
    }).then(res => {
        // ç¤ºä¾‹ æ–‡ä»¶åç¼€å†™æ­»çš„
        let fileName = 'filename.jpeg'
        let blob = new Blob([res.data], {type: "application/octet-stream"});
        if (window.navigator && window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob) { // IE
            window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob(blob, fileName)
        } else {
            let objectUrl = (window.URL || window.webkitURL).createObjectURL(blob)
            let downFile = document.createElement('a')
            downFile.style.display = 'none'
            downFile.href = objectUrl
            downFile.download = fileName // ä¸‹è½½åæ–‡ä»¶å
            document.body.appendChild(downFile)
            downFile.click()
            document.body.removeChild(downFile) // ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆç§»é™¤å…ƒç´ 
            window.URL.revokeObjectURL(objectUrl)   // åªè¦æ˜ å°„å­˜åœ¨ï¼ŒBlobå°±ä¸èƒ½è¿›è¡Œåƒåœ¾å›æ”¶ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸€æ—¦ä¸å†éœ€è¦å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œå°±å¿…é¡»å°å¿ƒæ’¤é”€URLï¼Œé‡Šæ”¾æ‰blobå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
        }
    }).catch(err=>{
        console.log(err)
    })
}

# å·¥å…·ç±»ç‰ˆ

// ----------- è¯·æ±‚ -------------
// å¯¼å‡ºè¡¨æ ¼ - å¯¼å‡ºExcel
export function exportExcel(data) {
    return request({
        url: '/api/spuInfo/exportExcel',
        method: 'post',
        data: JSON.stringify(data), // å°†æ•°æ®è½¬æ¢ä¸º JSON å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
        headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json' // æŒ‡å®šå†…å®¹ç±»å‹ä¸º JSON
        },
        responseType: 'blob'
    }).then(res => {
        // å¯¼å‡ºExcel
        setExportExcel(res, 'äº§å“ä¿¡æ¯-')
    }).catch(err=>{
        console.log(err)
    })
}

// ä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶ - é€šè¿‡æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
export function downloadFileByFilePath(filePath) {
    return request({
        url: '/api/uploadFile/downloadFileByFilePath',
        method: 'post',
        params: {
            filePath: filePath
        },
        responseType: 'blob'
    }).then(res => {
        // ä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶
        setDownloadFile(res)
    }).catch(err=>{
        console.log(err)
    })
}

// ----------- å·¥å…·ç±» -------------
/**
 * é€šè¿‡è¡¨æ ¼æµæ•°æ®å¹¶å¯¼å‡ºExcel
 * @param res è¯·æ±‚å“åº”çš„æ–‡ä»¶æµ
 * @param name æ–‡ä»¶åå‰ç¼€
 */
export function setExportExcel(res, name) {
    // æ–‡ä»¶åå‰ç¼€ + æ—¶é—´æˆ³ + æ–‡ä»¶åç¼€
    let suffix = res.headers['content-disposition'].split('.')[1]
    let fileName = name + new Date().getTime() + '.' + suffix;
    let blob = new Blob([res.data], {type: "application/vnd.ms-excel;charset=UTF-8"});
    if (window.navigator && window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob) { // IE
        window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob(blob, fileName)
    } else {
        let objectUrl = (window.URL || window.webkitURL).createObjectURL(blob)
        let downFile = document.createElement('a')
        downFile.style.display = 'none'
        downFile.href = objectUrl
        downFile.download = fileName // ä¸‹è½½åæ–‡ä»¶å
        document.body.appendChild(downFile)
        downFile.click()
        document.body.removeChild(downFile) // ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆç§»é™¤å…ƒç´ 
        window.URL.revokeObjectURL(objectUrl)   // åªè¦æ˜ å°„å­˜åœ¨ï¼ŒBlobå°±ä¸èƒ½è¿›è¡Œåƒåœ¾å›æ”¶ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸€æ—¦ä¸å†éœ€è¦å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œå°±å¿…é¡»å°å¿ƒæ’¤é”€URLï¼Œé‡Šæ”¾æ‰blobå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
    }
}

/**
 * é€šè¿‡æ–‡ä»¶æµä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶
 * @param res è¯·æ±‚å“åº”çš„æ–‡ä»¶æµ
 */
export function setDownloadFile(res) {
    // æ—¶é—´æˆ³ + æ–‡ä»¶åç¼€
    let suffix = res.headers['content-disposition'].split('.')[1]
    let fileName = new Date().getTime() + '.' + suffix;
    let blob = new Blob([res.data], {type: "application/octet-stream"});
    if (window.navigator && window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob) { // IE
        window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob(blob, fileName)
    } else {
        let objectUrl = (window.URL || window.webkitURL).createObjectURL(blob)
        let downFile = document.createElement('a')
        downFile.style.display = 'none'
        downFile.href = objectUrl
        downFile.download = fileName // ä¸‹è½½åæ–‡ä»¶å
        document.body.appendChild(downFile)
        downFile.click()
        document.body.removeChild(downFile) // ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆç§»é™¤å…ƒç´ 
        window.URL.revokeObjectURL(objectUrl)   // åªè¦æ˜ å°„å­˜åœ¨ï¼ŒBlobå°±ä¸èƒ½è¿›è¡Œåƒåœ¾å›æ”¶ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸€æ—¦ä¸å†éœ€è¦å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œå°±å¿…é¡»å°å¿ƒæ’¤é”€URLï¼Œé‡Šæ”¾æ‰blobå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
    }
}

# Element æç¤º

updateRoleResource({
    id: this.rowData.id,
    resourceInfoVoList: addData
  }).then(res => {
    if (res.data.status == 200) {
      ElNotification({title: 'æˆåŠŸ', message: res.data.msg, type: 'success',})
    } else {
      ElNotification({title: 'é”™è¯¯', message: res.data.msg, type: 'error',})
    }
  }).catch((erro) => {
    ElNotification({title: 'å¼‚å¸¸', message: erro, type: 'info',})
  });

# Apache ECharts å›¾è¡¨

è¯´æ˜: ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº JavaScript çš„å¼€æºå¯è§†åŒ–å›¾è¡¨åº“ å¿«é€Ÿå…¥é—¨æ‰€æœ‰ç¤ºä¾‹

# å®‰è£… ECharts

Apache ECharts: CSDN å‚è€ƒåœ°å€

#ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å®‰è£…echartsåŒ…
npm install echarts --save
cnpm install echarts --save
#ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰å®‰è£…vue echartså·¥å…·åŒ…
npm install echarts vue-echarts
cnpm install echarts vue-echarts

# Mian.js å¼•å…¥

import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'
// Element Plus å¼•å…¥
import ElementPlus from 'element-plus';
import "element-plus/dist/index.css";
import * as ElementPlusIconsVue from "@element-plus/icons-vue";
// å¼•å…¥ axios
import axios from 'axios';

import ECharts from 'vue-echarts'  // å¼•å…¥ECharts
import "echarts";                  // å…¨å±€å¼•å…¥echarts

const app = createApp(App);
for (const [key, component] of Object.entries(ElementPlusIconsVue)) {
    app.component(key, component);
}

app.use(router);
app.use(ElementPlus);
app.provide('$axios',axios);
// æŒ‚è½½ECharts å‚æ•°1:vueæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­æŒ‚è½½echartsçš„åå­—  å‚æ•°2:æŒ‚è½½çš„ç»„ä»¶
app.component('ECharts',ECharts)
app.mount("#app");

# ECharts ä½¿ç”¨

**æƒ…å½¢ä¸€ï¼š**ä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢ä¸­åªä½¿ç”¨1~2ä¸ªEChartså›¾è¡¨

<template>
  <div id="MyTest">
    <!-- å›¾è¡¨çš„divæ ‡ç­¾ ref:æ–¹æ³•æ•°æ®æŒ‡å®šåç§° id:æ ·å¼ -->
    <div ref="apaichart" id="demoDIV"></div>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
// å¼•å…¥echartsçš„ä½ç½®
import * as echarts from "echarts";

export default {
  name: 'MyTest',
  data: function () {
    return {
      // å›¾è¡¨çš„æ•°æ® ä¼šæ ¹æ®å®˜ç½‘æä¾›æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼æ˜¾ç¤ºå¯¹åº”çš„å›¾è¡¨
      option: {
        title: {
          text: 'World Population'
        },
        tooltip: {
          trigger: 'axis',
          axisPointer: {
            type: 'shadow'
          }
        },
        legend: {},
        grid: {
          left: '3%',
          right: '4%',
          bottom: '3%',
          containLabel: true
        },
        xAxis: {
          type: 'value',
          boundaryGap: [0, 0.01]
        },
        yAxis: {
          type: 'category',
          data: ['Brazil', 'Indonesia', 'USA', 'India', 'China', 'World']
        },
        series: [
          {
            name: '2011',
            type: 'bar',
            data: [18203, 23489, 29034, 104970, 131744, 630230]
          },
          {
            name: '2012',
            type: 'bar',
            data: [19325, 23438, 31000, 121594, 134141, 681807]
          }
        ]
      },
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œå›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®èµ‹å€¼åˆå§‹åŒ–æ˜¾ç¤º
    this.getDate();
  },
  methods: {
    getDate() {
      // æŒ‡å®šå›¾è¡¨HTMLæ ‡ç­¾refå€¼
      let myEcharts = echarts.init(this.$refs.apaichart);
      // è®¾ç½®å›¾è¡¨å‚æ•°
      myEcharts.setOption(this.option);
    }
  },
}
</script>

<!-- ç»„ä»¶æ ·å¼ -->
<style scoped>
/*å›¾è¡¨çš„æ ·å¼*/
#demoDIV {
  width: 100%;
  height: 500px;
  /*border: 1px solid red;*/
}
</style>

æƒ…å½¢äºŒï¼šä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨äº†å¤šä¸ªEChartså›¾è¡¨

  • å°è£…å›¾è¡¨ç»„ä»¶
  • ä½¿ç”¨å°è£…çš„ç»„ä»¶åç§°è¿›è¡Œå¼•å…¥æ¸²æŸ“å±•ç¤º

æ³¨æ„ï¼šå¦‚æœè¦åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨å¤šä¸ªEChartså›¾è¡¨ï¼Œå°±ä¼šå‡ºç°å¾ˆå¤šå¾ˆå¤šoptionå’Œç±»åchartï¼Œå®¹æ˜“æ··ä¹±ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ€å¥½æŠŠå›¾è¡¨ä»¬å°è£…æˆç»„ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨

<template>
  <div id="HomePageView">
    <h1>å‡è£…æœ‰å†…å®¹ -- ä¸»é¡µ -- ç•¥ç•¥</h1>
    <div style="width: 500px; height: 300px">
      <!--æŠ˜ç°å›¾-->
      <ChartView/>
      <!--æŸ±çŠ¶å›¾-->
      <ZhuZuangView/>
      <!--çºµå‘æŸ±çŠ¶å›¾ å°è£…çš„å›¾è¡¨æ–‡ä»¶åç§°-->
      <MyTest/>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import ChartView from "@/views/ApacheECharts/ChartView";
import ZhuZuangView from "@/views/ApacheECharts/ZhuZuangView";
import MyTest from "@/views/ApacheECharts/MyTest";

export default {
  name: 'HomePageView',
  components: {MyTest, ZhuZuangView, ChartView},
  data: function () {
    return {

    };
  },
  methods: {},
}
</script>

# ECharts æ•°æ®ä¼ é€’æ¸²æŸ“

# çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ æ•°æ®ä¼ é€’

<template>
  <div id="HomePageView">
    <div style="width: 800px; height: 800px">
      <!--å›¾è¡¨ç»„ä»¶ æ ¹æ®æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼æ¸²æŸ“ä¸åŒå›¾è¡¨-->
      <EChartsView ref="getview"/>
      <EChartsView ref="setview"/>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import ChartView from "@/views/ApacheECharts/ChartView";
import ZhuZuangView from "@/views/ApacheECharts/ZhuZuangView";
import MyTest from "@/views/ApacheECharts/MyTest";
import EChartsView from "@/views/ApacheECharts/EChartsView";

export default {
  name: 'HomePageView',
  components: {MyTest, ZhuZuangView, ChartView, EChartsView},
  data: function () {
    return {
      // å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ® å¯ä¼ é€’åˆ°å­å›¾è¡¨ç»„ä»¶å½“ä¸­è¿›è¡Œæ¸²æŸ“
      optionData: {
        title: {
          text: 'Stacked Line'
        },
        tooltip: {
          trigger: 'axis'
        },
        legend: {
          data: ['Email', 'Union Ads', 'Video Ads', 'Direct', 'Search Engine']
        },
        grid: {
          left: '3%',
          right: '4%',
          bottom: '3%',
          containLabel: true
        },
        toolbox: {
          feature: {
            saveAsImage: {}
          }
        },
        xAxis: {
          type: 'category',
          boundaryGap: false,
          data: ['Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat', 'Sun']
        },
        yAxis: {
          type: 'value'
        },
        series: [
          {
            name: 'Email',
            type: 'line',
            stack: 'Total',
            data: [120, 132, 101, 134, 90, 230, 210]
          },
          {
            name: 'Union Ads',
            type: 'line',
            stack: 'Total',
            data: [220, 182, 191, 234, 290, 330, 310]
          },
          {
            name: 'Video Ads',
            type: 'line',
            stack: 'Total',
            data: [150, 232, 201, 154, 190, 330, 410]
          },
          {
            name: 'Direct',
            type: 'line',
            stack: 'Total',
            data: [320, 332, 301, 334, 390, 330, 320]
          },
          {
            name: 'Search Engine',
            type: 'line',
            stack: 'Total',
            data: [820, 932, 901, 934, 1290, 1330, 1320]
          }
        ]
      },
      zhexianData: {
        title: {
          text: 'Stacked'
        },
        tooltip: {
          trigger: 'axis',
          axisPointer: {
            type: 'cross',
            label: {
              backgroundColor: '#6a7985'
            }
          }
        },
        legend: {
          data: ['Email', 'Union Ads', 'Video Ads', 'Direct', 'Search Engine']
        },
        toolbox: {
          feature: {
            saveAsImage: {}
          }
        },
        grid: {
          left: '3%',
          right: '4%',
          bottom: '3%',
          containLabel: true
        },
        xAxis: [
          {
            type: 'category',
            boundaryGap: false,
            data: ['Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat', 'Sun']
          }
        ],
        yAxis: [
          {
            type: 'value'
          }
        ],
        series: [
          {
            name: 'Email',
            type: 'line',
            stack: 'Total',
            areaStyle: {},
            emphasis: {
              focus: 'series'
            },
            data: [120, 132, 101, 134, 90, 230, 210]
          },
          {
            name: 'Union Ads',
            type: 'line',
            stack: 'Total',
            areaStyle: {},
            emphasis: {
              focus: 'series'
            },
            data: [220, 182, 191, 234, 290, 330, 310]
          },
          {
            name: 'Video Ads',
            type: 'line',
            stack: 'Total',
            areaStyle: {},
            emphasis: {
              focus: 'series'
            },
            data: [150, 232, 201, 154, 190, 330, 410]
          },
          {
            name: 'Direct',
            type: 'line',
            stack: 'Total',
            areaStyle: {},
            emphasis: {
              focus: 'series'
            },
            data: [320, 332, 301, 334, 390, 330, 320]
          },
          {
            name: 'Search Engine',
            type: 'line',
            stack: 'Total',
            label: {
              show: true,
              position: 'top'
            },
            areaStyle: {},
            emphasis: {
              focus: 'series'
            },
            data: [820, 932, 901, 934, 1290, 1330, 1320]
          }
        ]}
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    // æ–¹å¼ä¸€: å°†çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶çš„æ•°æ®ä¼ é€’åˆ°å­ç»„ä»¶, åœ¨é€šè¿‡å¼‚æ­¥çš„æ–¹å¼ç¡®ä¿å›è°ƒçš„å­ç»„ä»¶å‡½æ•°åœ¨æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶è·å–åˆ°æ•°æ®
    this.$refs.getview.optionData = this.optionData;
    this.$nextTick(() => {
      // åœ¨ä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡ DOM æ›´æ–°å‘¨æœŸä¸­è·å–åˆ°æ–°çš„ optionData
      this.$refs.getview.setCharts();
    });

    // æ–¹å¼äºŒ: é€šè¿‡ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨å­ç»„ä»¶çš„æ–¹å¼å¹¶å­˜å…¥å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œæ¸²æŸ“
    this.$refs.setview.setChartsData(this.zhexianData);
      
    // æ–¹å¼ä¸‰: å¤šæ¬¡ä¿®æ”¹æ•°æ®å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°æ•°æ®ä¸åˆ·æ–°
    // åœ¨è·å–æ–°çš„æ•°æ®å‰é”€æ¯å·²æœ‰çš„å›¾è¡¨å®ä¾‹
    if (this.$refs.setview && this.$refs.setview.chart) {
      this.$refs.setview.chart.dispose();
    }
    // åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„å›¾è¡¨å®ä¾‹
    this.$refs.setview.chart = echarts.init(this.$refs.setview.$el);
    // åœ¨æ›´æ–°optionçš„å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®åä½¿ç”¨ setOption æ›´æ–°å›¾è¡¨
    this.$refs.line.chart.setOption(this.option);
      
  },
  methods: {

  },
}
</script>

<!-- ç»„ä»¶æ ·å¼ -->

</style>

# å­ç»„ä»¶

  • EChartsView.vue å›¾è¡¨ç»„ä»¶æ¨¡æ¿
<template>
  <div id="EChartsView">
    <!-- å›¾è¡¨çš„divæ ‡ç­¾ ref:æ–¹æ³•æ•°æ®æŒ‡å®šåç§° id:æ ·å¼ -->
    <div ref="chart" id="chartDiv"></div>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
// å¼•å…¥echartsçš„ä½ç½®
import * as echarts from "echarts";

export default {
  name: 'EChartsView',
  data: function () {
    return {
      // å›¾è¡¨çš„æ•°æ® ä¼šæ ¹æ®å®˜ç½‘æä¾›æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼æ˜¾ç¤ºå¯¹åº”çš„å›¾è¡¨
      chartData: {},
    };
  },

  // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œå›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®èµ‹å€¼åˆå§‹åŒ–æ˜¾ç¤º
  mounted() {
    // this.getDate();
  },

  methods: {
    // é€šè¿‡è·å–dataå€¼æ¸²æŸ“
    setCharts() {
      // æŒ‡å®šå›¾è¡¨HTMLæ ‡ç­¾refå€¼
      let myEcharts = echarts.init(this.$refs.chart);
      // è®¾ç½®å›¾è¡¨å‚æ•°
      myEcharts.setOption(this.chartData);
    },
    // ç›´æ¥ä¼ é€’å€¼è¿›è¡Œæ¸²æŸ“
    setChartsData(chartData) {
      // æŒ‡å®šå›¾è¡¨HTMLæ ‡ç­¾refå€¼
      let myEcharts = echarts.init(this.$refs.chart);
      // è®¾ç½®å›¾è¡¨å‚æ•°
      myEcharts.setOption(chartData);
    }
  },
}
</script>

<!-- ç»„ä»¶æ ·å¼ -->
<style scoped>
/*å›¾è¡¨çš„æ ·å¼*/
#chartDiv {
  width: 100%;
  height: 300px;
}
</style>

# ECharts åç«¯æ¡ˆä¾‹

  • åç«¯è°ƒç”¨è·å–æ•°æ®, åœ¨è¯·æ±‚æˆåŠŸè·å–æ•°æ®åå†è°ƒç”¨å­ç»„ä»¶
  • å­ç»„ä»¶ä¸º ECharts æ•°æ®ä¼ é€’å­ç»„ä»¶æ¸²æŸ“æ¨¡æ¿
<template>
  <div id="tubiao">
    <el-button type="primary" @click="getBingViewMethods()">åˆ·æ–°æŒ‰é’®</el-button>
    <EChartsView ref="bing" style="width: 40%; height: 300px;"/>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import {getBingTestData} from "@/http/testApi";
import EChartsView from "@/views/ApacheECharts/EChartsView";

export default {
  name: "tubiao",
  components: {EChartsView},
  // data: å¯¹è±¡å°±æ˜¯è¦æ¸²æŸ“åˆ°é¡µé¢ä¸Šçš„æ•°æ® | ç”¨äºcmdåˆ›å»ºçš„vue
  data: function () {
    return {
      socketData: '',
      // å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ® å¯ä¼ é€’åˆ°å­å›¾è¡¨ç»„ä»¶å½“ä¸­è¿›è¡Œæ¸²æŸ“
      bingData: {
        title: {
          text: 'é¥¼çŠ¶å›¾è¡¨-æµ‹è¯•',
          subtext: 'è°ƒç”¨åç«¯æ¥å£æ•°æ®æä¾›',
          left: 'center'
        },
        tooltip: {
          trigger: 'item'
        },
        legend: {
          orient: 'vertical',
          left: 'left'
        },
        series: [
          {
            name: 'Access From',
            type: 'pie',
            radius: '50%',
            data: [
                //å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®
            ],
            emphasis: {
              itemStyle: {
                shadowBlur: 10,
                shadowOffsetX: 0,
                shadowColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'
              }
            }
          },
        ]
      },
    }
  },

  // moubted: é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæ¯•åæ‰§è¡Œ
  mounted() {
    this.getBingViewMethods();
  },

  // ç»„ä»¶é”€æ¯ä¹‹å‰è§¦å‘
  beforeDestroy() {

  },

  // åœ¨ç¦»å¼€å½“å‰è·¯ç”±å‰æ‰§è¡Œæ¸…ç†å·¥ä½œ ä¾‹å¦‚å…³é—­ WebSocket è¿æ¥ç­‰
  beforeRouteLeave(to, from, next) {

  },

  // methods: å¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­è°ƒç”¨
  methods: {
    // åˆ·æ–°å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®
    getBingViewMethods() {
      // è°ƒç”¨API then_æ­£å¸¸æ‰§è¡Œ / catch_æ‰§è¡Œå¼‚å¸¸
      getBingTestData().then(res => {
        console.log(res.data);
        this.bingData.series[0].data = res.data
        this.$refs.bing.setChartsData(this.bingData);
      }).catch((erro) => {
        console.log(erro, 'erro')
      });
    },
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>

# WebSocket å®æ—¶å›¾è¡¨

  • åç«¯å®šæ—¶å™¨è½®è¯¢è·å–æ•°æ®ä½¿ç”¨ WebSocket å‘é€æ•°æ® (åç«¯æ”¾è¡Œ)
  • å‰ç«¯è·å–åˆ°æ•°æ®å®æ—¶è°ƒç”¨å­ç»„ä»¶èµ‹å€¼æ¸²æŸ“æ›´æ–°å›¾è¡¨
  • WebSocket è¿›è¡Œèµ‹å€¼ä½¿ç”¨ this.$nextTick å¦åˆ™å¯èƒ½æŠ¥é”™
  • å­ç»„ä»¶ä¸º ECharts æ•°æ®ä¼ é€’å­ç»„ä»¶æ¸²æŸ“æ¨¡æ¿
<template>
  <div id="tubiao">
    <!--<h1>æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘é€çš„æ•°æ®: {{ socketData }}</h1>-->
    <el-button type="primary" @click="getBingViewMethods()">åˆ·æ–°æŒ‰é’®</el-button>
    <EChartsView ref="bing" style="width: 40%; height: 300px;"/>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import {getBingTestData} from "@/http/testApi";
import EChartsView from "@/views/ApacheECharts/EChartsView";

export default {
  name: "tubiao",
  components: {EChartsView},
  // data: å¯¹è±¡å°±æ˜¯è¦æ¸²æŸ“åˆ°é¡µé¢ä¸Šçš„æ•°æ® | ç”¨äºcmdåˆ›å»ºçš„vue
  data: function () {
    return {
      socketData: '',
      // å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ® å¯ä¼ é€’åˆ°å­å›¾è¡¨ç»„ä»¶å½“ä¸­è¿›è¡Œæ¸²æŸ“
      bingData: {
        title: {
          text: 'é¥¼çŠ¶å›¾è¡¨-æµ‹è¯•',
          subtext: 'è°ƒç”¨åç«¯æ¥å£æ•°æ®æä¾›',
          left: 'center'
        },
        tooltip: {
          trigger: 'item'
        },
        legend: {
          orient: 'vertical',
          left: 'left'
        },
        series: [
          {
            name: 'Access From',
            type: 'pie',
            radius: '50%',
            data: [],
            emphasis: {
              itemStyle: {
                shadowBlur: 10,
                shadowOffsetX: 0,
                shadowColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'
              }
            }
          },
        ]
      },
    }
  },

  // moubted: é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæ¯•åæ‰§è¡Œ
  mounted() {
    this.getBingViewMethods();
    // é“¾æ¥ WebSocket
    if ('WebSocket' in window) {
      let userInfo = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('account'));
      this.websocket = new WebSocket('ws://localhost:9000/webSocket/' + userInfo.id)
      this.initWebSocket()
    } else {
      alert('å½“å‰æµè§ˆå™¨ Not support websocket')
    }
  },

  // ç»„ä»¶é”€æ¯ä¹‹å‰è§¦å‘
  beforeDestroy() {
    console.log("å…³é—­é¡µé¢")
    this.onbeforeunload()
  },

  // åœ¨ç¦»å¼€å½“å‰è·¯ç”±å‰æ‰§è¡Œæ¸…ç†å·¥ä½œ ä¾‹å¦‚å…³é—­ WebSocket è¿æ¥ç­‰
  beforeRouteLeave(to, from, next) {
    console.log("ç¦»å¼€å½“å‰è·¯ç”±");
    this.closeWebSocket();
    next(); // è¡¨ç¤ºå…è®¸å¯¼èˆªç¦»å¼€ï¼Œå³ä¸è¿›è¡Œé˜»æ­¢
  },

  // methods: å¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­è°ƒç”¨
  methods: {
    // webSocket ç³»åˆ—æ–¹æ³•
    initWebSocket() {
      // è¿æ¥é”™è¯¯
      this.websocket.onerror = this.setErrorMessage
      // è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸ
      this.websocket.onopen = this.setOnopenMessage
      // æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯çš„å›è°ƒ
      this.websocket.onmessage = this.setOnmessageMessage
      // è¿æ¥å…³é—­çš„å›è°ƒ
      this.websocket.onclose = this.setOncloseMessage
      // ç›‘å¬çª—å£å…³é—­äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå½“çª—å£å…³é—­æ—¶ï¼Œä¸»åŠ¨å»å…³é—­websocketè¿æ¥ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢è¿æ¥è¿˜æ²¡æ–­å¼€å°±å…³é—­çª—å£ï¼Œserverç«¯ä¼šæŠ›å¼‚å¸¸ã€‚
      window.onbeforeunload = this.onbeforeunload
    },
    setErrorMessage() {
      console.log('WebSocketè¿æ¥å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯ çŠ¶æ€ç ï¼š' + this.websocket.readyState)
    },
    setOnopenMessage() {
      console.log('WebSocketè¿æ¥æˆåŠŸ çŠ¶æ€ç ï¼š' + this.websocket.readyState)
    },
    setOnmessageMessage(event) {
      // æ ¹æ®æœåŠ¡å™¨æ¨é€çš„æ¶ˆæ¯åšè‡ªå·±çš„ä¸šåŠ¡å¤„ç†
      this.socketData = event.data;
      console.log('æœåŠ¡ç«¯è¿”å›ï¼š' + event.data);

      let resData = JSON.parse(event.data);
      // ç¡®ä¿ DOM æ›´æ–°åå†ä½¿ç”¨ this.$refs.bing å¦åˆ™å¯èƒ½æŠ¥é”™
      this.$nextTick(() => {
        this.bingData.series[0].data = resData;
        this.$refs.bing.setChartsData(this.bingData);
      });
    },
    setOncloseMessage() {
      console.log('WebSocketè¿æ¥å…³é—­ çŠ¶æ€ç ï¼š' + this.websocket.readyState)
    },
    onbeforeunload() {
      this.closeWebSocket()
    },
    closeWebSocket() {
      this.websocket.close()
    },

    // åˆ·æ–°å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®
    getBingViewMethods() {
      // è°ƒç”¨API then_æ­£å¸¸æ‰§è¡Œ / catch_æ‰§è¡Œå¼‚å¸¸
      getBingTestData().then(res => {
        console.log(res.data);
        this.bingData.series[0].data = res.data
        this.$refs.bing.setChartsData(this.bingData);
      }).catch((erro) => {
        console.log(erro, 'erro')
      });
    },
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>

# Vue I18n å›½é™…åŒ–æ’ä»¶

  • å›½é™…åŒ–æ˜¯æŒ‡é¡¹ç›®èƒ½å¤Ÿæ ¹æ®ä¸åŒå›½å®¶çš„è¯­è¨€è¿›è¡Œè½¬æ¢ï¼Œä¾¿äºä¸åŒå›½å®¶çš„ç”¨æˆ·ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

  • Vue I18 æ˜¯ Vue.js çš„å›½é™…åŒ–æ’ä»¶ï¼Œå®ƒå¯ä»¥è½»æ¾åœ°å°†ä¸€äº›æœ¬åœ°åŒ–åŠŸèƒ½é›†æˆåˆ°åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºä¸­

# I18n é…ç½®

  • æ–°å¢ è¯­è¨€åŒ…

// src/langurage/en.js
// å®šä¹‰è‹±æ–‡è¯­è¨€åŒ…å¯¹è±¡
export default {
    navigateBar: {
        hotspot: 'Hotspot',
        experience: 'Experience',
        focus: 'Focus',
        recommend: 'Recommend'
    },
    tabs: {
        work: 'Work',
        private: 'Private',
        collect: 'Collect',
        like: 'Like'
    }
}

// src/langurage/zh.js
// å®šä¹‰ä¸­æ–‡è¯­è¨€åŒ…å¯¹è±¡
export default {
    navigateBar: {
        hotspot: 'çƒ­ç‚¹',
        experience: 'ç»éªŒ',
        focus: 'å…³æ³¨',
        recommend: 'æ¨è'
    },
    tabs: {
        work: 'ä½œå“',
        private: 'ç§å¯†',
        collect: 'æ”¶è—',
        like: 'å–œæ¬¢'
    }
}
  • main.js æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„å®Œæ•´ä»£ç 
import {createApp} from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'
// Element Plus å¼•å…¥
import ElementPlus from 'element-plus';
import "element-plus/dist/index.css";
import * as ElementPlusIconsVue from "@element-plus/icons-vue";
// å¼•å…¥ axios
import axios from 'axios';
import ECharts from 'vue-echarts' // å¼•å…¥ECharts
import "echarts";

// 1. å¼•å…¥ i18n å›½é™…åŒ– è¯­è¨€åŒ…
import en from "@/langurage/en";
import zh from "@/langurage/zh";
import {createI18n} from "vue-i18n"; // å…¨å±€å¼•å…¥echarts

// 2. ç»„åˆè¯­è¨€åŒ…å¯¹è±¡
const messages = {
    en,
    zh
}

// 3. åˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹å¯¹è±¡ åœ¨åˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹æ—¶ï¼Œä¸€å®šè¦å°† legacy å±æ€§è®¾ç½®ä¸º falseï¼Œå› ä¸º legacy é»˜è®¤ä¸º trueï¼Œå®ƒæ”¯æŒä½¿ç”¨ Vue2 æ¡†æ¶ä¸­çš„ Options APIï¼Œå¦‚æœè¦åœ¨ Vue3 æ›´å¥½çš„ä½¿ç”¨ Composition API æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±éœ€è¦å°†æ­¤å±æ€§æ‰‹åŠ¨è®¾ç½®ä¸º falseã€‚
// 3.1 export const i18n å¯ä»¥å¯¹ä»–è¿›è¡Œå¯¼å‡º åç»­å¯åœ¨jsæ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨å›½é™…åŒ–å˜é‡
const i18n = createI18n({
    legacy: false,  // è®¾ç½®ä¸º falseï¼Œå¯ç”¨ composition API æ¨¡å¼
    messages,
    locale: navigator.language // è·å–æµè§ˆå™¨çš„è¯­è¨€
    // locale: 'zh' // é»˜è®¤æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸­æ–‡
})

const app = createApp(App);
for (const [key, component] of Object.entries(ElementPlusIconsVue)) {
    app.component(key, component);
}
// 4. æŒ‚è½½å®ä¾‹å¯¹è±¡
app.use(i18n);
app.use(router);
app.use(ElementPlus);
app.provide('$axios',axios);
// æŒ‚è½½ECharts   å‚æ•°1:vueæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­æŒ‚è½½echartsçš„åå­—  å‚æ•°2:æŒ‚è½½çš„ç»„ä»¶
app.component('ECharts',ECharts);
app.mount("#app");

# I18n ä½¿ç”¨

// æ ‡ç­¾èµ‹å€¼
{{ $t('navigateBar.recommend') }}

// å±æ€§èµ‹å€¼
:content="$t('HomePageView')"

radioStatistics: this.$t('HomePageView.radio.my'),
        
// æ–¹æ³•é‡Œé¢ä½¿ç”¨ é€‰é¡¹å¼
this.$t('navigateBar.recommend')

// è·å–å½“å‰è¯­è¨€ ä¸­æ–‡_zh è‹±æ–‡_en
const currentLanguage = this.$i18n.locale;
console.log("å½“å‰è¯­è¨€: " + currentLanguage);

// åœ¨ js æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨
// 1. åœ¨ main.js å¯¼å‡º i18n / export åç»­å¯åœ¨jsæ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨å›½é™…åŒ–å˜é‡
export const i18n = createI18n({
    legacy: false,  // è®¾ç½®ä¸º falseï¼Œå¯ç”¨ composition API æ¨¡å¼
    messages,
    locale: navigator.language // è·å–æµè§ˆå™¨çš„è¯­è¨€
    // locale: 'zh' // é»˜è®¤æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸­æ–‡
})
// 2. js æ–‡ä»¶å¯¼å…¥ import { i18n } from '@/main.js';
import { i18n } from '@/main.js';
// 3. ä½¿ç”¨
i18n.global.t('common.dialog.title')

# åŠ¨æ€åˆ‡æ¢è¯­è¨€

æƒ³è¦åˆ‡æ¢è¯­è¨€æ—¶ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹ locale å±æ€§å°±å¯ä»¥äº†

// å­ç»„ä»¶è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶çš„æ–¹æ³• åˆ‡æ¢è¯­è¨€ å€¼å¿…é¡»æ˜¯è¯­è¨€æ–‡ä»¶çš„å¼•å…¥åç§°
switchover(command) {
  if (command == 'en') {
    this.$i18n.locale = 'en'; // åˆ‡æ¢ I18n è¯­è¨€åŒ… é€‰é¡¹å¼å†™æ³•
    this.$emit('childClick', en);
  } else {
    this.$i18n.locale = 'zh'; // åˆ‡æ¢ I18n è¯­è¨€åŒ… é€‰é¡¹å¼å†™æ³•
    this.$emit('childClick', zhCn);
  }
},

# package.json æ–‡ä»¶

VsCode: å¯åœ¨é‡Œé¢ç‚¹å‡» è°ƒè¯• è¿è¡Œ

vue é¡¹ç›®çš„æ ¸å¿ƒé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ package.json ä¸­å·²ç»é…ç½®äº†ä¸¤ä¸ªå‘½ä»¤ï¼š

IDEA ä¸­æŸ¥çœ‹ package.json æ–‡ä»¶çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œä½ ä¼šå‘ç°è¿™ä¸¤è¡Œå‘½ä»¤å‰å„æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä»£è¡¨è¿è¡Œçš„å¯ç‚¹å‡»çš„ç»¿è‰²ä¸‰è§’å½¢ã€‚

  • serve æ˜¯è¿è¡Œå‘½ä»¤ ã€‚åœ¨å¼€å‘è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬æœ€ç»å¸¸ç”¨åˆ°çš„å‘½ä»¤ã€‚é€šè¿‡å®ƒèƒ½å°† vue é¡¹ç›®è¿è¡Œèµ·æ¥ï¼Œæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬èƒ½é€šè¿‡æµè§ˆå™¨è®¿é—®ã€‚
  • build æ˜¯ç¼–è¯‘å‘½ä»¤ ã€‚æ˜¯åœ¨å¼€å‘ç»“æŸåå°†é¡¹ç›®æºç ç¼–è¯‘ã€æ•´åˆæˆæœ€ç»ˆçš„ htmlã€jsã€css ç­‰æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œè¿™äº›æ–‡ä»¶ä¼šå‡ºç°åœ¨é¡¹ç›®çš„ dist ç›®å½•ä¸‹

# vue.config.js æ–‡ä»¶

  • é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹é€šè¿‡ serve å‘½ä»¤è¿è¡Œé¡¹ç›®ä¼šå ç”¨ 8080 ç«¯å£ï¼Œå¦‚æœæƒ³ä½œå‡ºæ”¹å˜çš„è¯
  • å¯ä»¥åœ¨é¡¹ç›®çš„æ ¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹ï¼ˆå³ï¼Œå’Œ package.json æ–‡ä»¶åŒçº§ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªåä¸º vue.config.js çš„æ–‡ä»¶
  • è¯´æ˜ï¼š vue.config.js è¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯ @vue/cli é¡¹ç›®çš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä»¥å‰ï¼ˆvue-cliï¼‰å®ƒå« config/index.js

const { defineConfig } = require('@vue/cli-service')

// å¦‚æœå…¶ä»–äººé€šè¿‡å±€åŸŸç½‘è®¿é—®ä½ çš„å‰ç«¯é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œ127.0.0.1 æ˜¯æŒ‡å‘ä»–ä»¬è‡ªå·±çš„ç”µè„‘ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯ä½ çš„ç”µè„‘ã€‚127.0.0.1 é€šå¸¸æ˜¯æœ¬åœ°å›ç¯åœ°å€ï¼ŒæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯å½“å‰è®¾å¤‡
// å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…¨å±€å˜é‡ åç«¯è®¿é—®åœ°å€ ç»„ä»¶è°ƒç”¨: let url = process.env.VUE_APP_BACKEND_API_URL
// å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…¨å±€å˜é‡ å‰ç«¯è®¿é—®åœ°å€ ç»„ä»¶è°ƒç”¨: let url = process.env.VUE_APP_BACKEND_WEB_URL
const targetUrl = "http://127.0.0.1:3001";
const webUrl = "http://127.0.0.1:3002/#";

// const targetUrl = "http://192.168.1.180:3001";
// const webUrl = "http://192.168.1.180:3002/#";

// const targetUrl = "http://121.43.50.177:9010";
// const webUrl = "http://121.43.50.177:9004/#";


module.exports = defineConfig({
  transpileDependencies: true,
  runtimeCompiler: true,  // æ”¯æŒ compller ç¼–è¯‘æ¨¡å¼ ç›´æ¥è¿è¡Œ
  devServer: {
    client: {
      overlay: false // ç¦ç”¨æµè§ˆå™¨å…¨å±æç¤º
    },
    port: 3002,   //é…ç½®webæœåŠ¡å™¨çš„è®¿é—®ç«¯å£
    proxy: {
      "/api" : {                          // 1 å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€çš„é‚£äº›è¯·æ±‚éœ€è¦è¢«ä»£ç†æœåŠ¡å™¨è¿›è¡Œæ›¿æ¢
        target: targetUrl,                // 2 æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„è®¿é—®åœ°å€ target: "http://127.0.0.1:9000",
        changeOrigin: true,               // 3 æ˜¯å¦è·¨åŸŸ
        pathRewrite: {
          "^/api" : "/"   // 4 å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€è¯·æ±‚è¢«ä»£ç†çš„è§„åˆ™ /api/userList  -> /userList
        }
      }
    }
  },
  // æ³¨å†Œè¿™ä¸ªåç«¯è®¿é—®åœ°å€å˜é‡ä¸ºå…¨å±€ ç»„ä»¶è°ƒç”¨: let url = process.env.VUE_APP_BACKEND_API_URL
  chainWebpack: (config) => {
    config.plugin('define').tap((args) => {
      args[0]['process.env'].VUE_APP_BACKEND_API_URL = JSON.stringify(targetUrl);
      args[0]['process.env'].VUE_APP_BACKEND_WEB_URL = JSON.stringify(webUrl);
      return args;
    });
  },
})

# main.js æ–‡ä»¶

  • Element Plus é…ç½®
  • Axios é…ç½®
import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'
import ElementPlus from 'element-plus';
// Element Plus å¼•å…¥
import ElementPlus from 'element-plus';
import "element-plus/dist/index.css";
import * as ElementPlusIconsVue from "@element-plus/icons-vue";
// å¼•å…¥ axios
import axios from 'axios';

const app = createApp(App);
for (const [key, component] of Object.entries(ElementPlusIconsVue)) {
  app.component(key, component);
}

app.use(router);
app.use(ElementPlus);
app.provide('$axios',axios);
app.mount("#app");

# App.vue ä¸»è·¯ç”±ç»„ä»¶

  • æ¸²æŸ“æ—¶ä¼šè¦†ç›– index.html é¡µé¢, æ³¨æ„: style ä¸º å…¨å±€æ ·å¼

  • å…¶ä»–ç»„ä»¶éœ€ <style scoped>è¡¨ç¤ºæ­¤æ ·å¼åªåœ¨æœ¬ç»„ä»¶æœ‰æ•ˆ å¦åˆ™æœ‰å¯èƒ½å½±å“å…¶ä»–ç»„ä»¶

<template>
  <div id="app">
    <!-- ä¸»è·¯ç”±æ¸²æŸ“ -->
    <router-view></router-view>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: 'app',
    }
</script>

<!-- å…¨å±€æ ·å¼ -->
<style>
    * {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }

    html,
    body,
    #app {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
    }
</style>

# index.js è·¯ç”±å™¨

import Vue from 'vue'
import VueRouter from 'vue-router'
// ç›´æ¥æŒ‡å®šå¿…é¡»å¼•å…¥
import HomeView from '@/views/HomeView.vue' // @ ç›¸å½“äº src ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„

Vue.use(VueRouter)

const routes = [
  // redirect: '/login' é‡å®šå‘
  { path: '/', redirect: '/login' },
  // å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨ç®­å¤´å‡½æ•°æŒ‡å®š åˆ™ä¸Šæ–¹ä¸éœ€è¦å¼•å…¥
  { path: '/login', name: 'login',component: () => import('../views/LoginView.vue') },
  // å¦‚æœç›´æ¥æŒ‡å®š åˆ™å¿…é¡»åªåœ¨ä¸Šæ–¹å¼•å…¥
  { path: '/home', name: 'home', component: HomeView, 
        children : [
            {path: '/teacher', name: 'teacher', component: () => import('../views/TeacherView.vue')}
        ]
    }
]

// æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ•è·æ‰€æœ‰è·¯ç”±çš„è·¯ç”±ï¼Œç”¨äºå¤„ç†é”™è¯¯
routes.push({ path: '/:catchAll(.*)', name: 'error', component: () => import('../views/home/Error') });

const router = createRouter({
  // åœ°å€å¸¦ #
  history: createWebHashHistory(),
  // åœ°å€ä¸å¸¦ #
  // history: createWebHistory(),
  routes
})

export default router

// toï¼šè·¯ç”±å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå³å°†è¦è¿›å…¥çš„ç›®æ ‡
// fromï¼šè¡¨ç¤ºä»å“ªé‡Œæ¥
// nextï¼šå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ next å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ä½ å¯ä»¥è®© vue-router å»å¤„ç†å¯¼èˆªã€å–æ¶ˆå¯¼èˆªã€é‡å®šå‘åˆ°å…¶å®ƒåœ°æ–¹æˆ–æ‰§è¡Œå…¶å®ƒæ“ä½œã€‚
// é…ç½®è·¯ç”±å®ˆå«
router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
  // æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å»ç™»å½•
  if(to.path == '/login') {
      // å¦‚æœè¦å»ç™»å½•ï¼Œç›´æ¥æ”¾è¡Œ
      next();
  } else {
      let token = window.localStorage.getItem('token');

      // tokenä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå»ç™»å½•
      if(!token) {
          next('/login')
          return;
      }
      
      let expTime = JSON.parse(atob(token.split('\.')[1])).exp;
      let nowtime = (new Date()).getTime() / 1000;
      if(nowtime >= expTime) { // å¦‚æœè¿‡æœŸï¼Œå»ç™»å½•
          next('/login');
      } else {    // å¦åˆ™æ”¾è¡Œ
          next();
      }
  }
});

# è¡¥å……: ç™»å½•é¡µ

<template>
    <div id="login-main">
        <h1>{{testss}}</h1>
        <el-row type="flex" class="row-bg" justify="center" align="middle">
            <el-col :span="6">
                <el-form :model="userForm" status-icon :rules="rules" ref="userForm">
                    <el-form-item label="è´¦æˆ·" prop="username">
                        <el-input type="text" v-model="userForm.username"></el-input>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item label="å¯†ç " prop="password">
                        <el-input type="password" v-model="userForm.password"></el-input>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item>
                        <el-button type="primary" @click="btnlogin('userForm')">æäº¤</el-button>
                        <el-button @click="resetForm('userForm')">é‡ç½®</el-button>
                        <el-button @click="test()">æµ‹è¯•</el-button>
                    </el-form-item>
                </el-form>
            </el-col>
        </el-row>
    </div>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
    name: 'LoginView',
    data: function() {
        return {
            testss: '',
            userForm: {
                username: '',
                password: ''
            },
            rules: { // ç¼–å†™è¡¨å•éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
                username: [
                    { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å¸å·', trigger: 'blur' },
                    { min: 3, max: 8, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 3 åˆ° 8 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
                ],
                password: [
                    { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ', trigger: 'blur' },
                    { min: 3, max: 8, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 3 åˆ° 8 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    created() {
        // æ ¹æ® tocken è¿›è¡Œå¯¹åº”çš„è·³è½¬é¡µé¢
        // this.tockengoto();
    },
    methods: {
        test() {
            axios.get('/api/china/test', {
                params: {

                }
            }).then((res) => {
                console.log(res);
                this.userForm.username = res.data
            })
        },

        tockengoto() {
            //è·å–tockenï¼Œ å¦‚æœtokenä¸ºç©ºï¼Œ è¡¨æ˜éœ€è¦ç™»å½•
            let token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            if (!token) {
                return;
            }
            //tokenä¸ä¸ºç©ºä¸”æ²¡æœ‰è¿‡æœŸï¼Œç›´æ¥è·³è½¬/home
            let exptime = JSON.parse(atob(token.split('\.')[1])).exp;
            let nowtime = new Date().getTime() / 1000;
            if (exptime > nowtime) {
                this.$router.push('/home');
            }
        },

        btnlogin: function(formName) {
            //è°ƒç”¨è¡¨å•éªŒè¯ç»“æœ
            this.$refs[formName].validate((valid) => {
                if (valid) {
                    let formData = new URLSearchParams({
                        "username": this.userForm.username,
                        "password": this.userForm.password
                    });

                    // debugger
                    // æäº¤è¡¨å•
                    this.$axios.post('/api/login', formData.toString())
                        .then((res) => {
                            if(res.data.status == 200) {
                                // ä¿å­˜æœåŠ¡å™¨è¿”å›çš„token
                                let token = res.data.data;
                                window.localStorage.setItem('token', token);
                                window.localStorage.setItem('username', this.userForm.username);
                                // è·³è½¬åˆ°é¦–é¡µ
                                // this.$router.push({name: 'home'}); 
                                this.$router.push('/home');
                                this.$message({
                                    showClose: true,
                                    message: res.data.msg,
                                    type: 'warning'
                                });
                            }
                        })
                        .catch((erro) => {
                            
                        });
                } else {
                    console.log('error submit!!');
                    return false;
                }
            });

        },
        // é‡ç½®è¡¨å•
        resetForm: function(formName) {
            this.$refs[formName].resetFields();
        }
    }
}
</script>

<!-- <style scoped> è¡¨ç¤ºæ­¤æ ·å¼åªåœ¨æœ¬ç»„ä»¶æœ‰æ•ˆ å¦åˆ™æœ‰å¯èƒ½å½±å“å…¶ä»–ç»„ä»¶ -->

    #login-main {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        background-color: #2d434c;
    }

    .el-row {
        height: 100%;
        height: 100%;
    }

    .el-col {
        background-color: white;
        border-radius: 15px;
        padding: 30px;
        width: 300px;
        height: 400px;
    }

    .el-form{
        padding-top: 50px;
    }
</style>

# Vue åŸºç¡€ä½¿ç”¨

# è‡ªå®šä¹‰å·¥å…·ç±»

  • ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸º: æŒ‰éœ€æ³¨å†Œ | å…¨å±€æ³¨å†Œæœªæµ‹(å¾…å®š...)
  • æ–°å»º xxx.js å·¥å…·ç±»æ–‡ä»¶ resource.js å¹¶å†™å…¥æ–¹æ³•
  • å·¥å…·ç±»æ–‡ä»¶çš„å¯¼å…¥ import (éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨çš„é¡µé¢ä¸­å¼•å…¥è¯¥æ–‡ä»¶æˆ–è€…æŒ‰éœ€å¼•å…¥)
  • ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨å³å¯ resourceIsUser(this.inputStr);
/**
 * æ ¹æ® æƒé™ç¬¦ åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æƒé™
 * @param symbolStr æƒé™ç¬¦
 * @returns {boolean} æœ‰æƒé™_true | æ— æƒé™_false
 */
export function resourceIsUser(symbolStr) {
    let userInfo = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('account'));
    console.log(userInfo.symbolList, 'æƒé™é›†åˆ')
    if (userInfo.symbolList.includes(symbolStr)) {
        console.log(`ç”¨æˆ·æœ‰æƒé™: ${symbolStr}`);
        return true;
    } else {
        console.log(`ç”¨æˆ·æ— æƒé™: ${symbolStr}`);
        return false;
    }
}

// å…¨å±€æ–¹æ³•
export function getSysTheme() {
    let themeSwitch = window.localStorage.getItem("themeSwitch");
    if (themeSwitch == 'true') {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}

// å…¨å±€æ•°ç»„
export const BatchWmData = [
    {
        value: 'å¦',
        label: 'å¦'
    },
    {
        value: 'å›´è†œ',
        label: 'å›´è†œ'
    },
]

<template>
  <div class="user">
    <el-input v-model="inputStr" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥å†…å®¹"></el-input>
    <el-button type="success" @click="testResout()">æˆåŠŸæŒ‰é’®</el-button>
  </div>
</template>

// 1.å·¥å…·ç±»æ–‡ä»¶çš„å¯¼å…¥
import {resourceIsUser} from "@/util/resource";

export default {
  name: "moban",
  // data: å¯¹è±¡å°±æ˜¯è¦æ¸²æŸ“åˆ°é¡µé¢ä¸Šçš„æ•°æ®
  data: function () {
    return {
      inputStr: '',
    }
  },
  // methods: å¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­è°ƒç”¨
  methods: {
    testResout() {
      // 2.è°ƒç”¨
      let isNO = resourceIsUser(this.inputStr);
      console.log(isNO, 'æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æƒé™')
    },
  },
}
</script>

# Vue å¯¼å…¥ç»„ä»¶

è¯´æ˜:

  • input -> accept [ç±»å‹ä¸€,ç±»å‹äºŒ ... ] ä¸Šä¼ è¿‡æ»¤ç±»å‹ (ä¸èƒ½å¼ºåˆ¶)
  • xlsx: application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet
  • xls: application/vnd.ms-excel
<el-button v-show="isButton('spu.add')" @click="importExcel()">
<el-icon><Upload /></el-icon>
<input ref="fileInput" type="file" style="display: none"
       accept="application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet"
       @change="handleFileChange"
/>
</el-button>

// å¯¼å…¥è¡¨æ ¼
importExcel() {
  this.$refs.fileInput.click();
},
// ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶
handleFileChange(event) {
  const file = event.target.files[0];
  if (!file) return;
  // è·å–æ–‡ä»¶åç¼€
  const suffix = file.name.split('.').pop();
  // è·å–æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°
  const size = file.size;

},

# å‰ç«¯ API

# router-view è°ƒç”¨å­ç»„ä»¶

  • router-view ä¸ºå…¬å…±çš„è·¯ç”±æ¸²æŸ“ èƒ½å°†æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸å…³çš„å­ç»„ä»¶é€šè¿‡è·¯ç”±è¿›è¡Œæ¸²æŸ“
  • çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶è°ƒç”¨å­ç»„ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨defineExposeæš´éœ²çš„å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦å…ˆç”¨refè·å¾—å­ç»„ä»¶å®ä¾‹ï¼Œå†é€šè¿‡å­ç»„ä»¶å®ä¾‹è°ƒç”¨
  • å¦‚æœå­ç»„ä»¶æ˜¯ç”¨router-viewæ¸²æŸ“çš„è¯ï¼Œå°±æ— æ³•ç›´æ¥é€šè¿‡refè·å–åˆ°å­ç»„ä»¶çš„å®ä¾‹äº†ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä»¥ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹æ–¹æ³•è·å¾—å­ç»„ä»¶å®ä¾‹

<router-view v-slot="{ Component }">
	<component :is="Component" ref="child" />
</router-view>
  • åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªæƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œv-slot="{ Component }"æ˜¯Vueçš„ä¸€ç§æ–°çš„è¯­æ³•ï¼Œ
  • ç”¨äºå°†è·¯ç”±ç»„ä»¶çš„æ¸²æŸ“å‡½æ•°çš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†æš´éœ²ç»™çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ã€‚åœ¨è¿™é‡Œï¼ŒComponentä»£è¡¨å½“å‰æ¸²æŸ“çš„è·¯ç”±ç»„ä»¶ã€‚
  • åœ¨çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ä¸­è°ƒç”¨å­ç»„ä»¶çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡refå°†<component>æ ‡ç­¾ç»‘å®šåˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡ä¸Šï¼Œç„¶ååœ¨éœ€è¦çš„æ—¶å€™é€šè¿‡è¿™ä¸ªå˜é‡æ¥è®¿é—®å­ç»„ä»¶
<template>
  <!-- å­è·¯ç”±ç»„ä»¶æ¸²æŸ“ æš´éœ²å½“å‰å­ç»„ä»¶ å¯é€šè¿‡refç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨å­ç»„ä»¶çš„æ–¹æ³•-->
<router-view v-slot="{ Component }">
  <component :is="Component" ref="view" />
</router-view>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  methods: {
    callChildMethod() {
      // åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰ç»„ä»¶çš„è·¯ç”±å¹¶è°ƒç”¨å­ç»„ä»¶æ–¹æ³•
      if (this.$route.path != '/boardAfter') return;
        this.$nextTick(() => {
          // è°ƒç”¨å­ç»„ä»¶æ–¹æ³•
          this.$refs.view.initializeData();
        });
    }
  }
}
</script>

        <!--å­ç»„ä»¶æ¸²æŸ“-->

  	components: {ziZhuJian},

        setViewData() {
            // é€šè¿‡å­ç»„ä»¶çš„ç»„ä»¶refååŠæ•°æ®åè·å–åˆ°æ•°æ® å¹¶ç»™å…¶èµ‹å€¼
            this.$refs.ç»„ä»¶refå.å­ç»„ä»¶æ•°æ®å = å€¼;

        },

            // é€šè¿‡å­ç»„ä»¶çš„ç»„ä»¶refååŠæ–¹æ³•åæ‰§è¡Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³• æœ‰å‚å¯ä¼ å‚

	this.$emit('childClick');

    <Role-operate ref="operate" @childClick="getLanguage"/>
    getLanguage(language) {
      this.locale = language;

# æµè§ˆå™¨æœ¬åœ°æ•°æ®

// å‚¨å­˜æ•°æ®:     
window.localStorage.setItem('æ•°æ®å', æ•°æ®);
// æ ¹æ®åå­—åˆ é™¤æ•°æ®:     
window.localStorage.removeItem("æ•°æ®å");
// åˆ é™¤æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®:

# æ•°ç»„æ“ä½œ

# å¤šä¸ªæ•°ç»„åˆå¹¶

// é€‰ä¸­çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
const checked = [5,7,8];
// åŠé€‰çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
const partial = [1,2,3];
// ä¸¤æ•°ç»„è¿½åŠ åœ¨ä¸€èµ·
const addData = [...checked, ...partial];

# æ•°ç»„æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨æŸå­—ç¬¦ä¸²

// åˆ¤æ–­æ•°ç»„æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«æŸä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸² å…¨åŒ…
const stringArray = ["apple", "banana", "orange", "grape"];
const searchString = "orange";
if (stringArray.includes(searchString)) {
    console.log(`æ•°ç»„åŒ…å«å­—ç¬¦ä¸² ${searchString}`);
} else {
    console.log(`æ•°ç»„ä¸åŒ…å«å­—ç¬¦ä¸² ${searchString}`);
}

let b = [1, 2, 6, 8];

// æ‰¾å‡ºåœ¨aä¸­å­˜åœ¨ä½†åœ¨bä¸­ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„å…ƒç´

        åˆ—è®¾ç½®

        title: 'æç¤º',

# å®šæ—¶å™¨

<template>
  <div id="HomePage">
	{{ currentTime }}
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'HomePageView',
  data: function () {
    return {
      currentTime: '', // æ–°å¢å½“å‰æ—¶é—´å±æ€§
      intervalId: null, // æ–°å¢å®šæ—¶å™¨idå±æ€§
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    // è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶é—´ å¹¶ä¸”æ¯éš”ä¸€ç§’æ›´æ–°ä¸€æ¬¡ å®šæ—¶å™¨
    this.intervalId = setInterval(() => {
      this.newTime();
    }, 1000);
  },
  // åœ¨ç¦»å¼€å½“å‰è·¯ç”±å‰æ‰§è¡Œæ¸…ç†å·¥ä½œ ä¾‹å¦‚å…³é—­ WebSocket è¿æ¥ç­‰
  beforeRouteLeave(to, from, next) {
    clearInterval(this.intervalId); // æ¸…é™¤å®šæ—¶å™¨
    next(); // è¡¨ç¤ºå…è®¸å¯¼èˆªç¦»å¼€ï¼Œå³ä¸è¿›è¡Œé˜»æ­¢
  },
  methods: {
    // è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶é—´
    newTime() {
      this.currentTime = new Date().toLocaleString('chinese', { hour12: false });
      console.log('getNow()');
    }
  },
}
</script>

# è·å– vue å¯åŠ¨è·¯å¾„

åœ¨Vue.jsä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æœä½ æƒ³è·å–åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºçš„å¯åŠ¨åœ°å€ï¼ˆå³å½“å‰é¡µé¢çš„URLï¼‰ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨window.locationå¯¹è±¡ã€‚å…·ä½“æ¥è¯´ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡window.location.hrefæ¥è·å–å®Œæ•´çš„URLï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä½¿ç”¨å…¶ä»–å±æ€§æ¥è·å–ä¸åŒéƒ¨åˆ†çš„URLï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚window.location.originè·å–åè®®å’Œä¸»æœºéƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸€äº›å¸¸è§çš„window.locationå±æ€§ï¼š

  • window.location.href: å®Œæ•´çš„URLï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬åè®®ã€ä¸»æœºã€è·¯å¾„å’ŒæŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°ã€‚
  • window.location.origin: åè®®å’Œä¸»æœºéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œä¸åŒ…æ‹¬è·¯å¾„å’ŒæŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°ã€‚
  • window.location.protocol: åè®®éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå¦‚ "http:" æˆ– "https:"ã€‚
  • window.location.host: ä¸»æœºéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬åŸŸåå’Œç«¯å£ã€‚
  • window.location.hostname: åŸŸåéƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚
  • window.location.port: ç«¯å£éƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚
  • window.location.pathname: è·¯å¾„éƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚
  • window.location.search: æŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°éƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚

ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œå¦‚æœä½ æƒ³è·å–å®Œæ•´çš„URLï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼š

var currentURL = window.location.href;
console.log(currentURL);

æˆ–è€…å¦‚æœä½ åªéœ€è¦åè®®å’Œä¸»æœºéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼š

var origin = window.location.origin;
console.log(origin);

æ ¹æ®ä½ çš„éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©åˆé€‚çš„å±æ€§æ¥è·å–å¯åŠ¨åœ°å€çš„ä¸åŒéƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚

# ç›‘å¬é”®ç›˜æŒ‰é”®

  • event.keyCode è·å–æŒ‰é”®çš„å€¼
  • åœ¨å…¨å±çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹æ˜¯æ— æ³•è¿›è¡Œç›‘å¬çš„
// moubted: é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæ¯•åæ‰§è¡Œ
mounted() {
  // ç›‘å¬æŒ‰é”®äº‹ä»¶
  window.addEventListener("keydown", this.handleKeyDown);
},

// åœ¨ç»„ä»¶é”€æ¯æ—¶ç§»é™¤äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬ï¼Œä»¥é˜²æ­¢å†…å­˜æ³„æ¼
beforeDestroy() {
  window.removeEventListener("keydown", this.handleKeyDown);
},

// methods: å¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­è°ƒç”¨
methods: {
  // å¤„ç†æŒ‰é”®äº‹ä»¶
  handleKeyDown(event) {
    // åˆ¤æ–­æŒ‰ä¸‹çš„é”®æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ Esc é”®ï¼ˆé”®ç ä¸º 27ï¼‰
    if (event.keyCode === 27) {
        // åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œä½ çš„å…¶ä»–æ“ä½œï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä¸æ‰§è¡Œä»»ä½•æ“ä½œ
      }
    }
  },
},

# js é€šè¿‡ç±»åè®¾ç½®æ ·å¼

// è·å–å…·æœ‰ç±»å"myDiv"çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
var myDiv = document.querySelector('.myDiv');
// æ·»åŠ æ–°çš„ç±»å
myDiv.classList.add('newClass');
// ç§»é™¤æ—§çš„ç±»å
myDiv.classList.remove('myDiv');
// è®¾ç½®å†…è”æ ·å¼
myDiv.style.color = 'blue';

// è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å…·æœ‰ç±»å"myDiv"çš„å…ƒç´ 
var myDivs = document.querySelectorAll('.myDiv');
// éå†æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¹¶è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œ
myDivs.forEach(function (element) {
    // æ·»åŠ æ–°çš„ç±»å
    element.classList.add('newClass');
    // ç§»é™¤æ—§çš„ç±»å
    element.classList.remove('myDiv');
    // è®¾ç½®å†…è”æ ·å¼
    element.style.color = 'blue';
    element.style.fontSize = '18px';
});

# å…¨å±€ js å˜é‡

// å…¨å±€æ–¹æ³•
export function getSysTheme() {
    let themeSwitch = window.localStorage.getItem("themeSwitch");
    if (themeSwitch == 'true') {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}
// å…¨å±€æ•°ç»„

    {
        value: 'å¦',
        label: 'å¦'
    },
    {
        value: 'å›´è†œ',
        label: 'å›´è†œ'
    },
]

# css å¯¼å…¥å¤–éƒ¨æ ·å¼æ–‡ä»¶

  • /deep/ æ·±å±‚æ¬¡çš„åµŒå¥—é€‰æ‹©å™¨ åœ¨æœ¬ç»„ä»¶å¯ç”Ÿæ•ˆ
  • /deep/ åœ¨æ ·å¼æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šç”Ÿæ•ˆçš„ åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥çš„æ ·å¼æ–‡ä»¶åœ¨ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶å·²ç»åŠ è½½åˆ°DOMä¸­ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶çš„æ ·å¼é€‰æ‹©å™¨æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šè¢«Vueçš„scopedæ ·å¼åŒ…è£¹çš„
// è®¾ç½®ä¸»é¢˜
setTheme() {
  // ä»ç¼“å­˜ä¸­è·å–ä¸»é¢˜
  let themeSwitch = window.localStorage.getItem("themeSwitch");
  if (themeSwitch == 'true') {
    // è®¾ç½®ä¸»é¢˜ - æš—é»‘ä¸»é¢˜ ç»„ä»¶å†…éƒ¨åˆ‡æ¢
    let html = document.documentElement
    html.className = 'dark';
    // å¼•å…¥å…¨å±€æ ·å¼ - æš—é»‘ä¸»é¢˜
    import ('@/assets/css/app_dark.css');
  } else {
    // è®¾ç½®ä¸»é¢˜ - äº®ç™½ä¸»é¢˜ ç»„ä»¶å†…éƒ¨åˆ‡æ¢
    let html = document.documentElement
    html.className = 'light';
    // å¼•å…¥å…¨å±€æ ·å¼ - äº®ç™½ä¸»é¢˜
    import ('@/assets/css/app_light.css');
  }
},

<style lang="scss" scoped>
  @import '@/styles/page.scss';
</style>

<style src="@/style/md-dack.css" scoped></style>

# css çš„å˜é‡å±æ€§

åœ¨ :root ä¼ªç±»ä¸­å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸€ä¸ªåä¸º --bg-color çš„ CSS å˜é‡ï¼Œå¹¶å°†å…¶è®¾ç½®ä¸º #1f1f1fã€‚ç„¶åï¼Œåœ¨ .container ç±»ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨ var() å‡½æ•°æ¥å¼•ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªå˜é‡ï¼Œå¹¶å°†å…¶åº”ç”¨äºèƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²å±æ€§ã€‚è¿™æ ·ï¼Œä½ å°±å¯ä»¥åœ¨éœ€è¦æ—¶è½»æ¾åœ°æ›´æ”¹èƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²ï¼Œåªéœ€æ›´æ–°å˜é‡çš„å€¼å³å¯

  :root {
    --bg-color: #1f1f1f; /* å®šä¹‰èƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²å˜é‡ */
  }
  
  .container {
    background-color: var(--bg-color); /* ä½¿ç”¨èƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²å˜é‡ */
  }
</style>

  <!-- å†…å®¹ -->
</div>

# è®¾ç½®æ»šåŠ¨æ¡åˆ°æœ€åº•å±‚

  • åŸç”Ÿ div é…åˆ ID å®ç°
<div class="block" id="scrollContainer"></div>

// åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®è¯·æ±‚
listData() {
  // const loading = ElLoading.service({lock: true, background: 'rgba(252,252,252,0.54)',})
  getSideFlowBySelcetUrl({
    selcetUrl: this.afterDate.selcetUrl
  }).then(res => {
    if (res.data.status == 200) {
      // this.fromData.afterOrderNumber = res.data.data.afterVo.afterOrderNumber;
      this.afterDate = res.data.data.sidebAfterVo;
      this.tableData = res.data.data.sidebAfterVo.detailVoList;
      this.afterFlowVoList = res.data.data.afterFlowVoList;
        
      // ç¡®ä¿ DOM æ›´æ–°åå†ä½¿ç”¨ 
      this.$nextTick(() => {
        // æ ¹æ®æ ‡ç­¾idå±æ€§è·å–å®¹å™¨å…ƒç´ 
        let container = document.getElementById('scrollContainer');
        console.log(container, container.scrollHeight)
        // è®¾ç½®æ»šåŠ¨æ¡ä½ç½®åˆ°åº•éƒ¨
        container.scrollTop = container.scrollHeight;
      });
    }
      
  }).finally(() => {
    // è¯·æ±‚æ— è®ºæˆåŠŸ/å¤±è´¥ éƒ½æ‰§è¡Œå…³é—­loading
    // loading.close();
  });
  • ç»„ä»¶ é…åˆ class å®ç° æ³¨æ„classä¿æŒå”¯ä¸€
<el-scrollbar height="750px" wrap-class="scrollContainer"></el-scrollbar>

// ç¡®ä¿ DOM æ›´æ–°åå†ä½¿ç”¨
  this.$nextTick(() => {
    // æ ¹æ®æ ‡ç­¾classå±æ€§è·å–å®¹å™¨å…ƒç´ 
    let container = document.getElementsByClassName('scrollContainer')[0];
    console.log(container)
    // è®¾ç½®æ»šåŠ¨æ¡ä½ç½®åˆ°åº•éƒ¨
    container.scrollTop = container.scrollHeight;
  });
}

# HTML æ–‡æœ¬ä¿ç•™æ–‡æœ¬åŸŸæ ¼å¼

  • è¦åœ¨ HTML ä¸­å±•ç¤ºæ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œå¹¶ä¿ç•™æ–‡æœ¬åŸŸçš„æ ¼å¼ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ <pre> å…ƒç´ æˆ–è€… CSS çš„ white-space å±æ€§ã€‚
